info.name: Dark Pastel for 8chan aka 8kun
info.description: This theme is built on top of Tomorrow, so be sure the select that in [Options] > Themes, and check "Apply to all boards". If there is anything I missed, feel free to tell me and/or edit the CSS yourself. I tried to keep it as simple as possible so others could take it and make their own themes.
info.additionalInfo:
1.0: Big Bang
1.0.1: Updated to work with 8ch.pl/vichan.net.
1.0.2: Once again working with vichan.net.
1.0.3: Updated to work with lainchan.
1.0.4: Updated to work with 8kun
